Open Letter to CEOs
News

Top companies with Russia exposure

Corporations that are dealing and operating with Russia will continue to fund Putin's war crimes after his unprovoked attack against a sovereign, democratic state at the heart of Europe.

That is why CEOs must act. While some corporations have made commitments to divest from Russia, most can go further. Some have made no commitment to cut ties with Russia in any way.

Below are the largest firms that for many years have had dealings with Russia. We must continue to ensure that corporates walk the walk and talk the talk.

Please use these details to make your voice heard and ensure corporations #BoycottRussia.


Legend:

☑️ taking action

❌ no recorded action
